channel.title: PI how do I make unlimited pray like on soulsplit?

item.title: PI how do I make unlimited pray like on soulsplit?

item.title: PI how do I make unlimited pray like on soulsplit?
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

I would just remove the prayer skill altogether then.

Then, in your configuration class just remove everything regarding prayer draining.

P.S. Might as well just have their prayer skill set to 99 upon login, unless you use a cache editor to remove the prayer skillicon as well.

Read full topic
item.source: PI how do I make unlimited pray like on soulsplit?

item.title: PI how do I make unlimited pray like on soulsplit?
item.dc:creator: @zingerman111 zingerman111
item.description:
@zingerman111 wrote:

might aswell give you this since all pi servers have this your looking to use this command

[code] if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“infpray”)) {
c.getPA().requestUpdates();
c.playerLevel[5] = 999999;
c.getPA().refreshSkill(5);
c.gfx0(310);
c.startAnimation(4304);
c.sendMessage(“You have inf prayer cause God demands it.”);

                    }[/code]
